text: Zillur Rahman (Champak) is a Bangladeshi chess International Master. He won back-to-back national titles in 1986 and 1987. ==Career== Zillur Rahman earned the International Master title in 1990. All of his IM qualifying norms were obtained at tournaments held in Dhaka. Zillur Rahman has represented Bangladesh in several Chess Olympiads, from 1980 to 2000. ==References== ==External links== * * Zillur Rahman chess games at 365Chess.com * Zillur Rahman team chess record at OlimpBase.org * Zillur Rahman FIDE rating history, 1984–2001 at OlimpBase.org * Zillur Rahman at Chessmetrics Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi chess players Category:Chess Olympiad competitors Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Zillur Rahman Champak
